data.name: Urban Venture
data.detailed_description:
Official Community Discord



Join the official community Discord to stay on top of game updates & news, participate in developer Q&As, and to provide feedback and input on the game's development!


About the Game

Ever wondered what it is like to be a taxi driver?


The most important aspect of Urban Venture is learning and adapting to the hectic environment around you. You arrive in Barcelona with only a car and a dream to your name. As you go out and learn the streets, you quickly realize that each delivery task can bring on a variety of challenges. Managing impatient passengers, rush couriering, traffic jams, road accidents, stormy days, and city events are all part of the experience in Urban Venture.

Travel through the streets of a realistic Barcelona on a 1:1 scale picking up jobs and taking part in different scenarios. You can also grow and even start managing your own transportation company! Make sure you're following the rules of the road, and keeping your customers happy to get the most out of every trip.

Features





A 1:1 authentic recreation of the famous city of Barcelona, the second-largest city in Spain after Madrid. Experience Urban Venture in an open-world environment, where the player takes charge of his or her destiny.



Realistic traffic rules with sophisticated AI systems making cars, mimic real world behaviors.



Deep customization and management tools to choose the looks of your character, brand, cabin and vehicle performance. Look cool, even while taking grandma to see the kids!



Over 200 of Barcelona’s most famous landmarks, historical buildings, parks, and sculptures. Take a ride around the city to enjoy the landscape in “free ride” mode, or give people a city tour visiting the different types of attractions and architecture.



A living city with all the day-to-day hustle and bustle: pedestrians, traffic, and unexpected events.



Dynamic weather which has an influence on the driving conditions. When it rains, adjust your braking distance to avoid a collision or turn on the AC on a sunny day to cater to your passengers request.



Driving model which requires to control fuel and endurance level of the car with real influence on the driving experience. You know what they say, a happy car means happy customers!

data.short_description: Venture into Barcelona's buzzing streets as a driver to deliver passengers, cargo, and more. Complete time-based jobs, evade traffic jams, and road hazards, all while respecting the rules of the road. Discover famous city landmarks while building your transportation empire!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 @ 3.5 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X @ 3.7 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 870 | AMD Radeon RX 670
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Additional Notes: Please note that these informations aren't final and may be subject to change until the launch of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 @ 3.6 GHz or AMD Ryzen 7 1700 @ 3.8 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX 5800 with 4 GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Additional Notes: Please note that these informations aren't final and may be subject to change until the launch of the game.
